title: Promise Me Forever
description: As a divorced single father, I live by three rules:1. Make sure every day my daughter, Paisley, knows she’s number one in my life. No. Matter. What.2. Keep contact with my cheating ex-wife to a minimum.3. Turn Maxwell Wineries into a legacy that keeps Paisley set for life.When I hire Lexi to look after my daughter, I realize I need another rule: don’t pursue Paisley’s nanny.But even if I had that rule it wouldn’t matter. Because I'm breaking it already.
author: Layla Hagen
